review: The chromecast is a very nice Idea.It was very easy to set up with my android phone.My first dissapointment was that in order to use one of the apps (e.g netflix) you HAVE to keep the broadcasting device on.It's very easy to have only little to almost no battery in your phone. so that's kind of upsetting.It's able to broadcast your chrome tab, and (experimentally) all the screen (that might be usefull for presenting powerpoint slides on a projector or screen).I would have waited for the "next generation chromecast" (maybe I still can have it because the chromecast updates itself). or maybe (more likely) Google will shut down the project due to lack of success and smart TVs start to be the norm for the majority.If you have a computer (haven't tried mac) or android phone (haven't tried iphone) and an old LCD tv you wish to turn into netflix capable, this could be a smart/cheap choice.
